(Infra_RedisCache) note right of Closed CLOSED STATE - All requests flow through - Monitor failure rate - Track response times - Increment error counter end note note right of Open OPEN STATE - Block all requests - Return cached response - Or return error immediately - Wait for timeout period - Log all blocked attempts end note note right of HalfOpen HALF-OPEN STATE - Allow test requests - Limited throughput - Monitor success rate - Quick transition decision end note
